profile.name: Vijaykumar Karthikeyan
profile.title: Founder, Developer, and Researcher
profile.bio:
Hi, I'm Vijay! I like Science, Soccer, and Pandas. I am a current second-year undergraduate studying Bioengineering and Computer Science at UCLA. I am the Co-founder and CTO of Cogenesis, Inc. 
 
 I am passionate about building, especially to accelerate scienific innovation. Would love to chat about anything!

experiences.title: Co-Founder,CTO
experiences.description: Transforming Biological Image Analysis with Artificial Intelligence
achievements: Incubated in Founder's, Inc. and Startup UCLA.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Student
experiences.description: Studying Bioengineering with a Technical Breadth in Computer Science.
achievements: Undergraduate Student Researcher at UCLA Bioengineering
Involved in Biomedical Engineering Society and VEST @ UCLA

experiences.title: Student Researcher
experiences.company: The Kamariza Lab at UCLA Bioengineering
experiences.description: Developing CRISPR-based Diagnostics for Infectious Diseases.
achievements: Developing Algorithmic Tools for CRISPR Assay Design based on intermoelcular interactions

experiences.title: Kwo - Machine Learning for Health Prediction
experiences.company: UCLA Biomedical Engineering Society Design Team
experiences.description: Led Backend Development for this application. Utilizied and Organized Apple HealthKit data to train custom Machine Learning models to predict individual health metrics.
achievements: Presented at BMES Tech Projects Symposium

experiences.title: AI for Short form Content Creation
experiences.description: Developed an algorithm to prepare hooks for short forms demos of the product 'Lookbk' (The Shazam for clothes). Utilizing RunwayML I was able to generate AI generated videos of people before a short demo is displayed.
achievements: Delivered Project to Lookbk for use in their marketing

experiences.title: kwikchart
experiences.description: Developed a platform to allow for the understanding of Electronic Health Records (EHRs) through Natural Language Processing (NLP) and LLMs. Targeted towards helping Neurodivergent patients to better understand their health.
achievements: Second Place at the UCLA BMES Biohack 2025

experiences.title: High School Student
experiences.company: Paul Laurence Dunbar High School, Lexington, KY
experiences.description: Student at the Math Science & Technology Center (MSTC) at Paul Laurence Dunbar High School (selective admissions).

experiences.title: High School Researcher
experiences.company: University of Kentucky Center for Applied Energy Research
experiences.description: Engineered Machine Learning Pipelines to accurately predict the interaction energiers of Organic Semiconductors from their intermolecular interactions. Further, validated the use of Active Learning in the fields of Energy Research.
achievements: Presented at the Kentucky Science and Engineering Fair

experiences.title: 3D Tunable Magnetic Field for use in Particle Physics Experiments
experiences.company: Paul Laurence Dunbar High School & University of Kentucky
experiences.description: Created a Device capable of creating Tunable Magnetic Fields in all dimensions. This device is capable of maintaining a constant magnetic field with very accurate precision. This was done by creating a device that carrying 3 Helmholtz Coils oriented in the three dimensions.
achievements: Presented to the University of Kentucky Department of Engineering Faculty
